name: Luke Dixon
herotext: I develop websites and web apps.

experiences.title: Web Development
experiences.text:
Built multiple websites using content management systems like WordPress and Joomla as well as a bespoke system using VB.NET. Experienced in both the front end and back end side of the systems, with knowledge on SQL databases and the WordPress PHP backend framework.

Module Studio

experiences.title: Web-Based Game
experiences.text:
Worked in a team to design and develop a web-based game for the Nuclear department to educate young children on the treatment that they will go through.

Spectacular Scan Game

experiences.title: React Development
experiences.text: I have developed small time web apps using React and Flask as a hobby and for experience. I have also done multiple code collaboration with friends; where we created React apps that took inspirations from real world apps on the web such as Instagram and Trello. Links can be found through my GitLab.

sections.title: BSc (Hons) Computer Science
sections.text: Studied Computer Science at King's College London for 3 years where I achieved an Upper Second Class Honours

sections.title: IT (level 3) Software Development
sections.text: Studied on a Software Development course in City and Islington College for 3 years and achieved 3 distinction stars (D* D* D*).

sections.title: Full Stack Web Developer - Module Media
sections.text: Working in a small team to develop websites for different companies as well as branding design to give a face to new and growing organisations. Developed fully live websites usings the CMS Wordpress as well as a bespoke system using .Net and some static HTML sites.
